utilities.name: SORT
utilities.description: Sorts records in a file based on specified key fields
utilities.notes: For large files, consider external sort or database ORDER BY

utilities.name: IDCAMS
utilities.description: Access Method Services - manages VSAM datasets
utilities.notes: DEFINE CLUSTER → CREATE TABLE, DELETE → DROP TABLE, REPRO → INSERT

utilities.name: IEFBR14
utilities.description: Dummy program that does nothing (used for allocation)
utilities.notes: Usually just creates/deletes files via DD statements

utilities.name: DFSORT
utilities.dotnet_equivalent: LINQ OrderBy or database ORDER BY
utilities.notes: Same as SORT, may have additional features like INCLUDE/OMIT

utilities.name: IKJEFT01
utilities.description: TSO/E Terminal Monitor Program - runs TSO commands in batch
utilities.notes: Usually runs REXX or executes SQL

utilities.name: DSNUTILB
utilities.dotnet_equivalent: EF Core bulk operations or SqlBulkCopy
utilities.notes: LOAD → BulkInsert, UNLOAD → SELECT to file

utilities.name: ICETOOL

utilities.name: ADRDSSU
utilities.notes: Usually handled by infrastructure, not application code

utilities.name: SYNCSORT
utilities.dotnet_equivalent: LINQ OrderBy or database ORDER BY

utilities.name: FILEAID
